name: Homegear::subscribePeer
shortDescription: Enables reception of events for a device.
description: This method enables reception of events for a device. You need to call subscribePeer() for pollEvent() to return events for a device. If you are calling subscribePeer() from a different thread than the main thread you need to call registerThread() first.

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The id of the peer to get events for

throws.description: Thrown only when not in main thread and when script id registered with registerThread() is invalid or registerThread() was not called.
